title: LA-23-10: Guidance on Detailees Between Agencies and Need for Agency Coordination
url: https://www.oge.gov/Web/oge.nsf/Legal Docs/12A0F5077AC1F95D852589E9006B23BE/$FILE/LA-23-10 - Guidance on Detailees Between Agencies and Need for Agency Coordination.pdf?open
summary: This Legal Advisory provides guidance on the application of several ethics laws and regulations to detailees between executive branch agencies, including in relation to agency supplemental regulations, the Standards of Conduct, financial disclosure filing, and required ethics training.
